import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ActivatedRoute} from "@angular/router"; import {Album, Photo} from "../models"; import {AlbumsService} from "../albums.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-album-photos', templateUrl: './album-photos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./album-photos.component.css'] }) export class AlbumPhotosComponent implements OnInit{ albumID: number; loaded : boolean; photos: Photo[]; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private albumService : AlbumsService) { this.albumID = 0; this.photos = []; this.loaded = true; } getPhotos(){ this.route.paramMap.subscribe((params) => { this.albumID = Number(params.get('id')); }); this.loaded = false; this.albumService.getPhotos(this.albumID).subscribe((photos) =>{ this.photos = photos; }) this.loaded = true; } ngOnInit(): void { this.getPhotos() } }
